briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of this class that can be used to save a document in the Doc format.
Initializes a new instance of this class that can be used to save a document in the Doc or Dot format.
When false, small metafiles are not compressed for performance reason. Default value is true, all metafiles are compressed regardless of its size.
Gets/sets a password to encrypt document using RC4 encryption method.

detaileddescription.para: In order to save document without encryption this property should be null or empty string.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the format in which the document will be saved if this save options object is used. Can be Doc or Dot.
When false, PictureBullet data is not saved to output document. Default value is true.

detaileddescription.para: This option is provided for Word 97, which cannot work correctly with PictureBullet data. To remove PictureBullet data, set the option to "false".

briefdescription.para: When false, RoutingSlip data is not saved to output document. Default value is true.
Can be used to specify additional options when saving a document into the Doc or Dot format.

detaileddescription.para: At the moment provides only the SaveFormat property, but in the future will have other options added, such as an encryption password or digital signature settings.
